tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Christmas) (NN time)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NN time)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NN year))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [time/NN nsubj>[time/NN compound>Christmas/NNP] cop>is/VBZ det>the/DT amod>best/JJS nmod:of>[year/NN case>of/IN det>the/DT] punct>!/.]
